```{python}
with open("/Users/lefie/301/gut_detective/romeo.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    romeo = f.read()
```

```{python}
with open("/Users/lefie/301/gut_detective/dracula.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    drac = f.read()
```

```{python}
import re

words_r = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", romeo.lower().strip()) 
words_r = [w for w in words_r if w] 

print(words_r[:15])
```

```{python}
import re

words_d = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", drac.lower().strip()) 
words_d = [w for w in words_d if w] 

print(words_d[:15])
```

```{python}
totalwords_d = len(words_d)
totalwords_r = len(words_r)

print("Total words in Dracula:", totalwords_d)
print("Total words in Romeo and Juliet:", totalwords_r)

uniquewords_d = len(set(words_d))
uniquewords_r = len(set(words_r))

print("Total unique words in Dracula:", uniquewords_d)
print("Total unique words in Romeo and Juliet:", uniquewords_r)
```

```{python}
avg_len_d = sum(len(w) for w in words_d) / len(words_d)
print("Average word length in Dracula:", avg_len_d)

avg_len_r = sum(len(w) for w in words_r) / len(words_r)
print("Average word length in Romeo and Juliet:", avg_len_r)
```

```{python}
adverbs_d = [w for w in words_d if w.lower().endswith("ly")]
print("Adverbs in Dracula:", len(adverbs_d))

adverbs_r = [w for w in words_r if w.lower().endswith("ly")]
print("Adverbs in Romeo and Juliet:", len(adverbs_r))
```

```{python}
quot_list = ['"', '“', '”']

in_dialogue = False
dialogue_words_d = []

for word in drac:
      if any(q in word for q in quot_list):
            in_dialogue = not in_dialogue
      if in_dialogue:
            dialogue_words_d.append(word)
            
print("Dialogue word count in Dracula:", len(dialogue_words_d))
```
